dialogue.DialogueString: The 'not-so-kind citizens' seem to have finally given up and scurried off, and Min didn't even flinch during his complete speech
With the money we will raise, I will buy ALL of Vincroyable and extract all the water from their grapes!”
“I’ll use the land to build large factories to harness the water residing in the earth!”
“On another note, still on the same page, Dabey’s sea is receding more and more over the years.”
“The fishes are dying and downtown Dabey is gaining a bigger and bigger ship graveyard.”
“I reckon all the water is just evaporating and deciding it needs a new home because apparently Psychonia’s not good enough for them!”
“This does leave the opportunity to send some researchers to that sea because boats have gone missing each time they tried to discover new land…”
“But the livelihood of the people comes first, so collecting raindrops it is!”
“If you want to survive this crisis, vote for the only person that’s actively trying to save you; hint, it’s me!”
“When I’m finally president of Midburgh, I’ll use my power to meet the Insaniac and have a good word with him!”
“Well, ‘fighting The Insaniac’ is the last resort.
“But he’s looked into this topic a lot and there doesn't exactly seem an explanation for where the water is going.
“A meeting with the Insaniac might seem like a pipedream, but it could be our only chance.
“Well, that’s about it! I wish you all a very great afternoon and I’ll see you next time!”
